Address.Address1: Duong Bao Hamlet, Duong To Commune Pho Quoc Island, Kien Giang Province

Description.Text: Set on one of the island's most well-known beaches, Truong Beach, the 5-star Novotel Phu Quoc Resort offers a spectacular beachfront location. Only 7 km away, this resort can be easily accessed from the airport. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.
Breakfast and Dinner are available at this property.
This accommodation has a large lobby.
